caption: A woman lies in bed. During the day, the two of them sit on the balcony. In a waiting hall, several people are sitting around a table. A man has a handgun on his table and is smoking in a room. By a car, a man is smoking, and they meet each other. The man by the car takes out a playing card and shows it to the other man. Afterward, he produces a stack of playing cards. An explosion occurs, and the car catches fire. A man in white rushes inside, pulling out a fire extinguisher, attempting to put out the flames.
